module.name: Bulk Phone Restart
module.changelog: *13.0.4* FREEPBX-7382 block other modules from installing that conflict with sip notify *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9537 Bulk Phone Restart Error *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* Visuals *12.0.1* Redo module_hook calls to use static obj *2.11.0.1* Add license info *2.11.0.0* bump version *2.10.0.4* fix/improve sip notify *2.10.0.3* assotred bug fixes *2.10.0.2* #5537 *2.10.0.1* minor fixes *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.2* #4401 *2.9.0.1* removed duplicate functions *2.9.0.0* #4627 *2.8.0.1* #4426 *2.8.0.0* #4309 *2.7.0.0* localizations *2.6.0.1* #3912 *2.6.0.0* Initial release
module.description: This module allows users to restart one or multiple phones that support being restarted via a SIP NOTIFY command through Asterisk's sip_notify.conf
